paper_abstract: If despite your better judgment you decide to read this article, keep in mind that it was written during the summer, and this has been the hottest summer ever. To avoid such articles in the future, respond to the call below: Request for Contributions: Do you have a news-item of interest? Social gossip? Do you have a pressing question that needs a serious answer? Don't procrastinate: send me an email with "CCR" in the subject.
paper_title: You must be joking... Should the Internet have an ON/OFF switch?
